title: Referral System (NA) Question
body: Say i use the Referral link i made before i swapped from NA to OCE; Would the Skins and IP/RP Rewards be transfered to this OCE Account or would i need to change to the NA Region in order to get them?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Argonian,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=nJb5QgXz,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-31T01:58:51.069+0000)
>
> Say i use the Referral link i made before i swapped from NA to OCE; Would the Skins and IP/RP Rewards be transfered to this OCE Account or would i need to change to the NA Region in order to get them?

yunges@abv.bg

If you have the skins on your account as in you are able to go into a game and use them, Yes they will transfer. If you have the RP/IP on your account that SHOULD also transfer as far as I am aware.

-SumCoolAid
There's no referral system on OCE. {{item:3070}}
